archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.3.2d: d) technology-related material (e.g. application settings, access control arrangements, security and network diagrams, device inventories, data storage details and cryptographic solutions).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
